snippet: Mr. King brought television audiences “Red Shoe Diaries” and wrote and directed several soft-core films, some in collaboration with his wife, Patricia Knop.
abstract: Zalman King, a filmmaker who mixed artistic aspiration, a professed empathy for female sexuality and gauzy photography to bring soft-core pornography to cable television, dies at age 70.
lead_paragraph: Mr. King brought television audiences “Red Shoe Diaries” and wrote and directed several soft-core films, some in collaboration with his wife, Patricia Knop.

headline.seo: Zalman King, Creator of Soft-Core Films, Dies at 70
headline.main: Zalman King, Creator of Soft-Core Films, Dies at 70
headline.print_headline: Zalman King, 70, Creator of Soft-Core Films
